title: fiora -__-
body:
so whats the deal with fiora being able to ult while cc'd 
for example had 2 different games where ahri would charm her in 5 different team fights and she would instantly proc her ult after walking towards her for a split second 
the other occasion was when a lissandra ulted fiora under turret the animation went off and she was locked in the ice for a split second then managed to ult still 
riot needs to fucking disable her quick or fix

replies.body:

YES
This is the same reason that if Thresh hook's an Ez, he can still E, it's a CC allowance.
I've never had this happen as Fiora. I've been charmed by Ahri, and my ult only goes off once the charm ends. Dunno what problems you're having mate.
goddammit i should of recorded the match next time im against a fiora ill record the match and link everyone to the replay on op.gg
ez flash ignite lee sin go 999/0 before fiora gets 6 gg wp report fiora rage quit
